name: Dark Conquer Club 2011
description:
Darker and more finished than my other: style 25212

Requires BoB and Clickable maps greasemonkey scripts to work properlly. 
Greasemonkey: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/748/
BoB: http://www.conquerclub.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=527&t=91386
Clickable maps: http://www.conquerclub.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=527&t=104488

Designed to use side stats, but stats below the map work aswell.


(screenshot has BOB greasemonkey script running in which ive got the sidemenu hidden.)

style_setting_options.label: No ( recommended for experienced players )
